violationsByInspectionidList.name: Little Caesars Arena- Suite Level Bars
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) Utility service lines and pipes may not be unnecessarily exposed.
(B) Exposed utility service lines and pipes shall be installed so they do not obstruct or prevent cleaning of the floors, walls, or ceilings.
(C) Exposed horizontal utility service lines and pipes may not be installed on the floor.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Little Caesars Arena- Suite Level Bars
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Little Caesars Arena- Suite Level Bars
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) Areas designated for EMPLOYEES to eat, drink, and use tobacco shall be located so that FOOD, EQUIPMENT, LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES are protected from contamination.
(B) Lockers or other suitable facilities shall be located in a designated room or area where contamination of FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES can not occur.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Relocate to a designated area that does not contaminate items or surfaces.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Little Caesars Arena- Suite Level Bars
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
FOOD shall be protected from contamination by storing the FOOD:
(1)     In a clean, dry location;
(2)     Where it is not exposed to splash, dust, or other contamination; and
(3)     At least 15 cm (6 inches) above the floor, unless otherwise approved.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Exposed to dust, splash, or other contaminates
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store in manner that does not contaminate items
